summary:
Rutsah is level 67, raised through normal means (not commands or mods). He has finished the basic
quests of all fanctions.
descriptionHtml:
You are an argonian mage/assassin. You are already Harbringer of the Companions, Arch-mage at the college of Winterhold, Guildmaster of the Thieves Guild, Listener of the Dark Brotherhood, destroyer of both Alduin And Miraak, the first dragonborn. You have led the Empire to victory over the Stormcloacks assisted the Dawnguard in eliminating the vampire menace. Why assisst the Dawnguard? Not because you believe vampires are evil of course. You are a werewolf, natural enemy of Molak Bal's children!

Rutsah is Hastur written differently. You specialise in Lightning Magic, should be mentioned that the game has a bug and you're allowed to wear as many amulets and rings as you want. Search the houses I've already bought and you might find all sorts of treasures hidden inside! Many of the quests have already been completed, what's left for you is to finish some jobs.

Dragonborn, Dawnguard and Hearthfire DLCes are advised, otherwise you're gonna lose much of the content I have unlocked.
author: Gravemaster
